document.topic_text: Hospice club supporters win big Winners of March club two draw: First prize of R20,000 was won by 1753 Lynn Garrett. 5 hours ago HIGHWAY Hospice 2,000 Club draw results from 19 April. Winners of the March club one draw: First prize of R20,000 was won by 1627 Ursula Brett. Second prize of R2,000 went the way of 1186 Jay Mathias. Three R1,000 prizes went to 1895 Carol-Anne Leibbrandt, 1073 Alan Joseph and 2433 EH Strydom. Winners of March club two draw: First prize of R20,000 was won by 1753 Lynn Garrett. Second prize of R2,000 went the way of 1963 AA McDonald. Three R1,000 prizes went to 1369 AI Odendaal, 1661 Roger Couzens and 2085 Jennifer Symons. Winners of March club three draw: First prize of R20,000 was won by 1751 Mary Leigh. Second prize of R2,000 went the way of 1684 Jeanette Dwyer, while three R1,000 prizes went to 1466 Lynette Pavitt, 2278 Paul Rabbipal and 1920 Fernanda Deehan. Hospice congratulates and thanks its supporters for their loyal support. SHARE
